Description: 2 bed 1 bath unit in Davis Square. 2nd floor unit. Unit includes Hardwood floors, Eat-in kitchen, Separate living room, backyard (shared), Front deck and private rear deck, Coin-op laundry in basement, Parking in front of the building. Pet friendly. Close to Davis Square T station. Available September 1st, 2023.
